description.default: toggle with parameter value with a char_limit of `20`
toggle with parameter value set to 'default testing' by default
toggle with parameter value set to '""'
toggle with parameter value set to 'null'
toggle with parameter value set to 'undefined'
toggle with placeholder text 'Enter a string'
toggle with error when set to 'error'
toggle with warning when set to 'warn'
Type 'error' in `Standard` column to show an `error`. Type 'warn' in `Additional` column to show an `warn`
toggle error handling for long strings
